### sum of biomass for each nfi plot (ltp)
```{r}
### open large tree plot tree file
SK_ltp_tree <- read.csv("C:/Users/krist/Downloads/CGCS KH/relevant_time_data/sk_gp_ltp_tree.csv")


names(SK_ltp_tree)

### select only relevant data columns
SK_ltp_biomass <- select(SK_ltp_tree, nfi_plot, meas_date, meas_num, biomass_total)

### replace NA values as 0
SK_ltp_biomass[is.na(SK_ltp_biomass)] <- 0

### biomass sums grouped by nfi plot and meas_date
SK_ltp_biomass_sum <- SK_ltp_biomass %>%
  group_by(nfi_plot, meas_date) %>%
  summarise(biomass_total =sum(biomass_total))

```

### merge biomass and resurveyed files (ltp)
```{r}
names(SK_ltp_biomass_sum)
names(SK_ltp_resurveyed)

### check similarities between file headers
intersect(names(SK_ltp_biomass_sum), names(SK_ltp_resurveyed))

### merge files based on nfi plot and meas_date
SK_ltp_biomass_merged <- merge(SK_ltp_biomass_sum, SK_ltp_resurveyed) %>%
  mutate(percent / 100) %>%
  mutate(percent/100 * biomass_total)

### save as csv
write.csv(SK_ltp_biomass_merged, "SK_ltp_biomass_merged.csv")

```

### sum of biomass for each nfi plot (stp)
```{r}
### open stp tree files
```

### merge biomass summary and resurveyed files
